gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Transparency
Interface IAxisAddible

All Superinterfaces:
IOverlayAddible, IZoomAddible
All Known Subinterfaces:
IColorScaleAddible, ILogAxisAddible, IPseudoLogAxisAddible, ITruLogAxisAddible
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContourLayoutHandler, ControlColorScale, FunctionViewComponent, ImageViewComponent
public interface IAxisAddible
extends IZoomAddible

This interface is implemented by view components that utilize the AxisOverlay2D for displaying axis calibrations.

See Also:
AxisOverlay2D

Methods inherited from interface gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Transparency.IOverlayAddible
getRegionInfo
 

Method Detail

getAxisInformation

AxisInfo getAxisInformation(int axiscode)
The integer code, either zero for x, or one for y, will determine which axis to get information for. The information is wrapped in an AxisInfo object.

Parameters:
axiscode - The AxisInfo axis code.
Returns:
Axis information pertaining to the specified axis.

getTitle

java.lang.String getTitle()
This method will return the title given to the image as specified by the Virtual Array

Returns:
The title being placed on the AxisOverlay.

getPrecision

int getPrecision()
This method will return the precision specified by the user. Precision will be assumed to be 4 if not specified. The axis overlays will call this method to determine the precision.

Returns:
The precision numbers are being limited to.

getFont

java.awt.Font getFont()
This method will return the font used on by the overlays. The axis overlay will call this to determine what font to use.

Returns:
The display font.
